item_description: Application of chemical or physical restraint of a patient by a specialist in the practice of the specialistâ€™s specialty of emergency medicine at a recognised emergency department of a private hospital
rationale: The note describes a concussion following a bicycle accident with reassurance and education, with no mention of any restraint being applied or required. There is no evidence of a restraint event, which is a core component of this item.
citations: Patient 11 years old with history of bicycle accident involving head and leg impact, with brief loss of consciousness.
Management: Reassurance, education on short-term and long-term effects of concussion; advice to return to ED if concerns arise in next 24-48 hours.
